code: import'../assets/css/CategoryNav.css';import'../assets/css/global.css';import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{Category}from"../contexts/CategoryContext";import{useContext}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CategoryNav(){const categories=useContext(Category);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"category-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"category-buttons",children:categories.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/categories/".concat(item.name),className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return isActive?'button selected-category-button':'button unselected-category-button';},children:item.name},item.name))})});}export default CategoryNav;
